text: Mahathir, the Musical is a Malaysian musical. It was performed at Istana Budaya in Kuala Lumpur from September 24 to October 4, 2010. The musical is about former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. ==Synopsis== The musical follows the life of Mahathir. It shows his rural background, Malaysia's independence in 1957, and his success in politics starting in the 1960s. It also portrays Mahathir as a visionary, from his childhood selling balloons to his rise as Prime Minister in 1981 and his time in office until he retired in 2003. == Cast == Role Actor Mahathir Esma Daniel Anwar Ibrahim Siti Hasmah Mohamad Ali ==References== Category:Mahathir Mohamad Category:Malaysian culture
title: Mahathir, the Musical
